medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain started at 1am this morning in the mid-epigastrium and has since migrated to the lower abdomen, worse on the right. The patient reports 1 day of abdominal pain and admits to subjective fever/chills, but denies any nausea, vomiting, chest pain, or shortness of breath. There has been no change in bowel habits or appetite.
